resources.string: 2 Numbers:\nskill rank, skill base characteristic rank
Basic positive die used in most skill checks. Represents aptitude in a skill.
A more powerful positive die used in most skill checks. Upgraded form of the ability die. Represents innate ability or training.
Basic negative die used in most skill checks. Represents the difficulty of a given task.
A more powerful negative die. Upgraded form of the difficulty die. Represents great adversity.
A positive die representing an advantage.
A negative die representing a disadvantage.
A die representing the force. Used only when a player calls upon the force.
